frontmatter.name: Braden Moore
frontmatter.title: Deciphering Brainwaves with the Web Audio API
frontmatter.bio: A former particle physicist, Braden left behind the world of hadron colliders and dark matter to become a web developer. After picking up JavaScript, he's never looked back. In his spare time, Braden is an avid writer and an aspiring fencer, and hopes to one day compete in the Olympics.
